Rest

Settings.ConfigureGridsHint: Configure which item types to auto-populate in each grid when a token is created
Settings.ConfigureAutoPopulateDescription:
Assign item types to hotbar grids for NPCs only. Each type can only be assigned to one grid.
Note: Player characters should use right-click → Auto-Populate Container instead.
Settings.AutoPopulatePassivesHint: Automatically populate passives container with feats that have no activities when a token is created
Settings.ShowItemNamesHint: Display item names on hotbar cells
Settings.ShowItemUsesHint: Display remaining uses on items that have limited uses
Settings.ShowHealthOverlayHint: Display red damage overlay on portrait images
Settings.EnableCPRGenericActionsHint: Show a vertical button next to the advantage container that triggers CPR's Generic Actions (2024) dialog
Settings.EnableCPRActionsAutoPopulateHint: Automatically populate quick access with CPR actions when tokens are created (uses 2014 or 2024 compendium based on D&D 5e Rules Version setting). If actions are manually selected, those take priority.
Settings.SelectedCPRActionsHint: Manually selected CPR actions to show in quick access (configure via 'Select CPR Actions' menu). List is populated with the compendium matching your D&D 5e Rules Version.
Settings.BlockCPRActionsOnHotbarHint: Prevent CPR Generic Actions from being dragged onto the hotbar. Derived items like 'Grapple: Escape' are still allowed.
Settings.EnableAdvBtnsMidiQoLHint: Add advantage/disadvantage buttons to the situational bonuses container when Midi-QoL is active
Settings.AutoPopulateOnTokenCreationHint: Automatically populate hotbar grids with items when a token is created
Settings.AutoPopulatePlayerCharactersHint: ⚠️ WARNING: This overrides the default behavior and allows auto-population for player characters. This is NOT recommended as players should have freedom to customize their own HUD. Only enable if you understand the implications.
Settings.FilterPreparedSpellsPlayersHint: Only show prepared spells for player characters. At-will, innate, and pact magic spells are always included.
Settings.FilterPreparedSpellsNPCsHint: Only show prepared spells for NPCs. At-will, innate, and pact magic spells are always included.
Settings.AutoPopulateConfigurationHint: Configure which item types to auto-populate in each grid (restricted to GM)

Display.MenuHint: Toggle item names and uses on hotbar cells

AutoPopulate.MenuHint: Control automatic population of grids and passives

ThirdParty.MenuHint: Configure integration with third-party modules like CPR and Midi-QoL

Menu.ScaleWithTokenHint: Scale the portrait image to match the token's scale

Passives.SaveForAllTokens: Save for all tokens of this type
Passives.SaveForAllTokensHint: Apply this selection to all future tokens of this actor

Advantage.AdvTooltip:
Left-click to set Advantage to roll only.
Right-click to toggle.
Advantage.DisTooltip:
Left-click to set Disadvantage to roll only.
Right-click to toggle.

GenericActionsButton.Label: ACTIONS
GenericActionsButton.Tooltip: Click to open CPR Generic Actions dialog

CPR.SelectActionsDescription: Select up to {max} CPR Generic Actions to show in quick access. List is populated with the compendium matching your D&D 5e Rules Version (2014/Legacy or 2024/Modern).
CPR.SelectActionsMenuHint: Choose which CPR Generic Actions to display in quick access (up to 6, based on Rules Version)
CPR.NoActionsAvailable: No CPR actions available. Make sure Chris's Premades module is installed and the appropriate CPRActions compendium exists for your Rules Version.
CPR.MaxSelectionsReached: Maximum of {max} actions can be selected

Notifications.NoItemTypesAvailable: No item types available for configuration
Notifications.CPRGenericActionsNotFound: CPR Generic Actions (2024) item not found. Make sure Chris's Premades module is installed and active.
Notifications.CPRModuleNotActive: Chris's Premades module is not active. Please enable it to use CPR features.
Notifications.ShortRestNotAvailable: Short rest not available for this actor
Notifications.LongRestNotAvailable: Long rest not available for this actor
Notifications.SlotOccupiedByTwoHandedWeapon: This slot is occupied by a two-handed weapon
Notifications.CPRActionBlockedFromHotbar: CPR Generic Actions cannot be added to the hotbar. Use the Quick Access grid instead.

AutoPopulateOptions.IncludeActivitiesHint: When enabled, items with multiple activities (e.g., Thrown weapons) will add each activity separately instead of the parent item
